text: China lands ground forces on the island of Taiwan
Russia and Ukraine sign a truce to stop all combat operations and honor it until the end of the year
Nuclear weapons are used in an attack (not just tested) somewhere in the world.
Xi Jinping is still the premier of China at the end of 2024.
Narendra Modi is still the prime minister of India at the end of 2024.
Benjamin Netanyahu is still the prime minister of Israel at the end of 2024.
Vladimir Putin is still the president of Russia at the end of 2024.
Vlodymyr Zelenskyy is still the president of Ukraine at the end of 2024.
Pope Francis (Jorge Mario Bergoglio) is still the active pope at the end of 2024.
Donald Trump is elected president.
Joe Biden is re-elected president.
A Republican candidate who isn't Donald Trump is elected president.
A Democrat candidate who isn't Joe Biden is elected president.
At least one third-party US presidential candidate gets 3% or more of the popular vote.
The US president elect dies between the election and the end of 2024.
2024 elections give Democrats control of the Senate.
2024 elections give Democrats control of the House of Representatives.
At least one member of the US Supreme Court steps down or dies during 2024.
President Jimmy Carter is still alive at the end of 2024.
Donald Trump is convicted of a federal crime.
Joe Biden is impeached.
Mainstream news outlets report definitively that Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have broken up.
Taylor Swift releases an album of composed primarily of entirely new music.
LeBron James retires from or otherwise leaves the NBA, and does not change his mind before the end of the year.
LeBron James and his son LeBron Jr (aka "Bronny") are under contract with the same NBA team at any point during 2024.
Lionel Messi retires from or otherwise leaves the MLS, and does not change his mind before the end of the year.
The US wins the most gold medals of any country (or ties for first) in the Paris Olympics.
The US wins the gold medal in basketball at the Paris Olympics.
One of the three championship favorites (Boston Celtics, Denver Nuggets, Milwaukee Bucks) wins the 2024 NBA title.
The S&P 500 closes the year higher than it began.
The Fed raises interest rates at least once in 2024 (even if they also decrease rates).
Sam Altman is still the CEO of OpenAI at the end of 2024.
OpenAI releases (or allows a public preview of) a product branded "GPT-5" or "ChatGPT-5".
Meta is ordered to divest a business unit, by federal court or commission.
Amazon is ordered to divest a business unit, by federal court or commission.
Alphabet is ordered to divest a business unit, by federal court or commission.
The X/Twitter platform still exists at the end of the year: you can log in, share content, and view content.
Nvidia remains in the top 10 American companies by market cap at the end of 2024.
Tim Cook is still the CEO of Apple at the end of the year.
Andy Jassy is still the CEO of Amazon at the end of the year.
